block.name: Add
block.doc: Implements the function out = in0 + in1 + ... + in(N-1).

param.name: IO Type
param.doc: Specifies the data type of the inputs and output.

option.name: Complex
option.doc: Inputs and output are complex values.

option.name: Float
option.doc: Inputs and output are floating point (real) values.

option.name: Int
option.doc: Inputs and output are integer values.

option.name: Short
option.doc: Inputs and output are short integer values.

param.name: Num Inputs
param.doc: Specifies the number of inputs. Inputs will be labelled in0 through in(N-1).

param.name: Vec Length
param.doc: Specifies the vector length for vector processing. Typical applications will use the default value of 1.
